title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Online
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Online 
Dissemination of Terrorist Content) (Designation of Coimisiún na Meán as a 
Competent Authority) Regulations 2023. 

(2) These Regulations come into operation on the 30th day of November
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited european union (online dissemination terrorist content) (designation coimisiun na mean competent authority) regulation 2023 (2) regulation come operation 30th day november

title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27
conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27
heading: 2. (1) In these Regulations “Regulation (EU) 2021/784” means Regulation
text_raw:
2. (1) In these Regulations “Regulation (EU) 2021/784” means Regulation 
(EU) 2021/784 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 29 April 
20211 on addressing the dissemination of terrorist content online. 

(2) A word or expression that is used in these Regulations and that is also 
used in Regulation (EU) 2021/784 has, unless the context otherwise requires, 
the same meaning in these Regulations as it has in Regulation (EU) 2021/784.
text_norm: 2 (1) regulation regulation (eu) 2021 784 mean regulation (eu) 2021 784 european parliament council 29 april 20211 addressing dissemination terrorist content online (2) word expression used regulation also used regulation (eu) 2021 784 unless context otherwise requires meaning regulation regulation (eu) 2021 784

title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27
heading: 3. Coimisiún na Meán is designated for the purposes of Article 12(1)(c) of
text_raw:
3. Coimisiún na Meán is designated for the purposes of Article 12(1)(c) of 
Regulation (EU) 2021/784 as the competent authority that is competent to 
oversee the implementation of specific measures pursuant to Article 5 of 
Regulation (EU) 2021/784.
text_norm: 3 coimisiun na mean designated purpose article 12(1)(c) regulation (eu) 2021 784 competent authority competent oversee implementation specific measure pursuant article 5 regulation (eu) 2021 784

title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27
heading: 4. Coimisiún na Meán shall carry out its functions as the competent
text_raw:
4. Coimisiún na Meán shall carry out its functions as the competent 
authority referred to in Regulation 3 in an objective and non-discriminatory 
manner, while fully respecting fundamental rights, and shall be independent in 
the exercise of those functions.
text_norm: 4 coimisiun na mean shall carry function competent authority referred regulation 3 objective non-discriminatory manner fully respecting fundamental right shall independent exercise function

title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27
heading: 5. Coimisiún na Meán shall, before 1 March each year, provide the
text_raw:
5. Coimisiún na Meán shall, before 1 March each year, provide the 
Minister for Justice with the relevant information required to be forwarded to 
the Commission of the European Union pursuant to Article 21 of Regulation 
(EU) 2021/784. 

1 OJ No. L 172, 17.5.2021, p.79. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 14th November, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [545] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

9 November, 2023. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 
Minister for Justice.
